channel.title: Server Status Checkers can't connect?
channel.description:
Well for some reason server status checkers say my server is offline. I've checked my ports, my server ip, updated my vps, but most of them say its offline. They were all looking fine and then suddenly a couple days ago just started saying offline. The server itself is ONLINE. You can check for yourself projectrevert.no-ip.biz http://www.megaupload.com/?d=UYY6P768
Idk what to do =[

item.title: Server Status Checkers can't connect?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

RuneMyth:

Sometimes im having this problem too!

Mines been like this for days now, and idk how to fix it.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Checkers can't connect?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:6, topic:343067”][quote author=frostscapeserver link=topic=439467.msg3229590#msg3229590 date=1275925386]
Would it have to do with something with portforwarding? Does anyone know if they use a different port or something…?
[/quote]Only 43594 or 5555.[/quote]

K. Nvrm, its not the ports, mines open.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Checkers can't connect?
item.dc:creator: @king_gauge king gauge
item.description:
@king_gauge wrote:

Well, idk about how to correct the problem, but you could just not use them… and if you could, please take out the download link, i dont think you would like to get reported… but if mod’s dont mind, then dont listen to me lol. But idk how to actually solve your problem, my only guess is stop using them until you do figure it out…

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status Checkers can't connect?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:343067”]I’m going to hazard a guess and say that this is an elaborate attempt at advertising. Posting your client was taking it a little to far.

If it is a real problem: Can other people connect and play?[/quote]

…No I’m not advertising…it would be a very poor advertisement. -.-
Yeah thats the thing. Anyone can play, just the status checkers say offline so people think its not online and don’t play =[

Read full topic
